body.p: The XML Structure Outline preferences panel is opened from menu Options Window Preferences oXygen XML Editor Author XML Structure Outline and contains the following preferences:

fig.title: The XML Structure Outline Preferences Panel
The XML Structure Outline Preferences Panel

ul.li: Preferred attribute names for display - The attribute names which should be preferred when displaying the element's attributes in the Outline view. If there is no preferred attribute name specified the first attribute of an element is displayed.

Enable outline drag and drop - Drag and drop should be disabled for the tree displayed in the Outline view only of there is a possibility to accidentally change the structure of the document by such drag and drop operations.
